spotify.refused: Sadly, Spotify is refusing Twitchat to use their API with unlimited users and (necessary) extended quotas.
spotify.how_to: To use it you'll have to {URL} and fill-in the values bellow:
spotify.usage: Connect with Spotify to control it from the Triggers or display currently playing track from the Overlays.
spotify.usage_connected: You can now display the currently playing track thanks to the dedicated {OVERLAY} or allow your viewers to control playback by creating {TRIGGERS}.

triggerSocket.usage: Connect to an external websocket server (ex: Chataigne) and send it data from any Trigger.
